title: 237. Ask Not What Your Podcast Can Do for You
description: Now and again, Freakonomics Radio puts hat in hand and asks listeners to donate to the public-radio station that produces the show. Why on earth should anyone pay good money for something that can be had for free? Here are a few reasons.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
